title: Introduction
description: Introduction to the video, mentioning the focus on anterior pelvic tilt and corrective routine.

children.title: Anterior Pelvic Tilt
children.description: Explanation of what is anterior pelvic tilt, its causes and the problems that arise from it.

children.title: Four-Step Solution
children.description: Discussion of the four-step solution to correct anterior pelvic tilt.

children.title: Underactive and Overactive Muscles
children.description: Explanation of the roles of underactive and overactive muscles in anterior pelvic tilt.

children.title: Step 1: Learning to Posteriorly Tilt the Pelvis
children.description: Guidance on learning to tilt the pelvis posteriorly.

children.title: Step 2: Strengthening Exercises
children.description: Introduction to strengthening exercises for glutes and abdominals.

children.title: Hip Thrust
children.description: Instruction on performing the hip thrust exercise.

children.title: RKC Planks
children.description: Instruction on performing RKC planks for abdominal strengthening.

children.title: Step 3: Stretching Overactive Hip Flexors
children.description: Introduction to stretching exercises for overactive hip flexors.

children.title: Lunge Stretch
children.description: Instruction on performing the lunge stretch exercise.

children.title: Rectus Femoris Stretch
children.description: Instruction on performing the rectus femoris stretch exercise.

children.title: Corrective Routine
children.description: Summary of the corrective routine and availability of a free pdf routine.

children.title: Conclusion
children.description: Closing remarks and reminders about maintaining posture in daily life and training.
